juzs.text: Qala 'Alam 'Aqul Laka 'Innaka Lan Tastati`a Ma`iya Sabraan
Qala 'In Sa'altuka `An Shay'in Ba`daha Fala Tusahibni Qad Balaghta Min Ladunni `Udhraan
Fantalaqa Hatta 'Idha 'Ataya 'Ahla Qaryatin Astat`ama 'Ahlaha Fa'abaw 'An Yuđayyifuhuma Fawajada Fiha Jidaraan Yuridu 'An Yanqađđa Fa'aqamahu Qala Law Shi'ta Lattakhadhta `Alayhi 'Ajraan
Qala Hadha Firaqu Bayni Wa Baynika Sa'unabbi'uka Bita'wili Ma Lam Tastati` `Alayhi Sabraan
Amma As-Safinatu Fakanat Limasakina Ya`maluna Fi Al-Bahri Fa'aradtu 'An 'A`ibaha Wa Kana Wara'ahum Malikun Ya'khudhu Kulla Safinatin Ghasbaan
Wa 'Amma Al-Ghulamu Fakana 'Abawahu Mu'uminayni Fakhashina 'An Yurhiqahuma Tughyanaan Wa Kufraan
Fa'aradna 'An Yubdilahuma Rabbuhuma Khayraan Minhu Zakaatan Wa 'Aqraba Ruhmaan

Wa 'Amma Al-Jidaru Fakana Lighulamayni Yatimayni Fi Al-Madinati Wa Kana Tahtahu Kanzun Lahuma Wa Kana 'Abuhuma Salihaan Fa'arada Rabbuka 'An Yablugha 'Ashuddahuma Wa Yastakhrija Kanzahuma Rahmatan Min Rabbika Wa Ma Fa`altuhu `An 'Amri Dhalika Ta'wilu Ma Lam Tasti` `Alayhi Sabraan
Wa Yas'alunaka `An Dhi Al-Qarnayni Qul Sa'atlu `Alaykum Minhu Dhikraan
Inna Makkanna Lahu Fi Al-'Arđi Wa 'Ataynahu Min Kulli Shay'in Sababaan
Fa'atba`a Sababaan
Hatta 'Idha Balagha Maghriba Ash-Shamsi Wajadaha Taghrubu Fi `Aynin Hami'atin Wa Wajada `Indaha Qawmaan Qulna Ya Dha Al-Qarnayni 'Imma 'An Tu`adhiba Wa 'Imma 'An Tattakhidha Fihim Husnaan
Qala 'Amma Man Zalama Fasawfa Nu`adhibuhu Thumma Yuraddu 'Ila Rabbihi Fayu`adhibuhu `Adhabaan Nukraan
Wa 'Amma Man 'Amana Wa `Amila Salihaan Falahu Jaza'an Al-Husna Wa Sanaqulu Lahu Min 'Amrina Yusraan
Thumma 'Atba`a Sababaan
Hatta 'Idha Balagha Matli`a Ash-Shamsi Wajadaha Tatlu`u `Ala Qawmin Lam Naj`al Lahum Min Duniha Sitraan
Kadhalika Wa Qad 'Ahatna Bima Ladayhi Khubraan
Thumma 'Atba`a Sababaan
Hatta 'Idha Balagha Bayna As-Saddayni Wajada Min Dunihima Qawmaan La Yakaduna Yafqahuna Qawlaan
Qalu Ya Dha Al-Qarnayni 'Inna Ya'juja Wa Ma'juja Mufsiduna Fi Al-'Arđi Fahal Naj`alu Laka Kharjaan `Ala 'An Taj`ala Baynana Wa Baynahum Saddaan
Qala Ma Makkanni Fihi Rabbi Khayrun Fa'a`inuni Biquwatin 'Aj`al Baynakum Wa Baynahum Radmaan
Atuni Zubara Al-Hadidi Hatta 'Idha Sawa Bayna As-Sadafayni Qala Anfukhu Hatta 'Idha Ja`alahu Naraan Qala 'Atuni 'Ufrigh `Alayhi Qitraan
Fama Asta`u 'An Yazharuhu Wa Ma Astata`u Lahu Naqbaan
Qala Hadha Rahmatun Min Rabbi Fa'idha Ja'a Wa`du Rabbi Ja`alahu Dakka'a Wa Kana Wa`du Rabbi Haqqaan
Wa Tarakna Ba`đahum Yawma'idhin Yamuju Fi Ba`đin Wa Nufikha Fi As-Suri Fajama`nahum Jam`aan
Wa `Arađna Jahannama Yawma'idhin Lilkafirina `Arđaan
Al-Ladhina Kanat 'A`yunuhum Fi Ghita'in `An Dhikri Wa Kanu La Yastati`una Sam`aan
Afahasiba Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'An Yattakhidhu `Ibadi Min Duni 'Awliya'a 'Inna 'A`tadna Jahannama Lilkafirina Nuzulaan
Qul Hal Nunabbi'ukum Bil-'Akhsarina 'A`malaan
Al-Ladhina Đalla Sa`yuhum Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Hum Yahsabuna 'Annahum Yuhsinuna Sun`aan
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Rabbihim Wa Liqa'ihi Fahabitat 'A`maluhum Fala Nuqimu Lahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Waznaan
Dhalika Jaza'uuhum Jahannamu Bima Kafaru Wa Attakhadhu 'Ayati Wa Rusuli Huzuan
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Kanat Lahum Jannatu Al-Firdawsi Nuzulaan
Khalidina Fiha La Yabghuna `Anha Hiwalaan
Qul Law Kana Al-Bahru Midadaan Likalimati Rabbi Lanafida Al-Bahru Qabla 'An Tanfada Kalimatu Rabbi Wa Law Ji'na Bimithlihi Madadaan
Qul 'Innama 'Ana Basharun Mithlukum Yuha 'Ilayya 'Annama 'Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Faman Kana Yarju Liqa'a Rabbihi Falya`mal `Amalaan Salihaan Wa La Yushrik Bi`ibadati Rabbihi 'Ahadaan
Kaf-Ha-Ya-`Ayn-Sad
Dhikru Rahmati Rabbika `Abdahu Zakariya
Idh Nada Rabbahu Nida'an Khafiyaan
Qala Rabbi 'Inni Wahana Al-`Azmu Minni Wa Ashta`ala Ar-Ra'su Shaybaan Wa Lam 'Akun Bidu`a'ika Rabbi Shaqiyaan
Wa 'Inni Khiftu Al-Mawaliya Min Wara'i Wa Kanati Amra'ati `Aqiraan Fahab Li Min Ladunka Waliyaan
Yarithuni Wa Yarithu Min 'Ali Ya`quba Wa Aj`alhu Rabbi Rađiyaan
Ya Zakariya 'Inna Nubashiruka Bighulamin Asmuhu Yahya Lam Naj`al Lahu Min Qablu Samiyaan
Qala Rabbi 'Anna Yakunu Li Ghulamun Wa Kanat Amra'ati `Aqiraan Wa Qad Balaghtu Mina Al-Kibari `Itiyaan
Qala Kadhalika Qala Rabbuka Huwa `Alayya Hayyinun Wa Qad Khalaqtuka Min Qablu Wa Lam Taku Shay'aan
Qala Rabbi Aj`al Li 'Ayatan Qala 'Ayatuka 'Alla Tukallima An-Nasa Thalatha Layalin Sawiyaan
Fakharaja `Ala Qawmihi Mina Al-Mihrabi Fa'awha 'Ilayhim 'An Sabbihu Bukratan Wa `Ashiyaan
Ya Yahya Khudhi Al-Kitaba Biquwatin Wa 'Ataynahu Al-Hukma Sabiyaan
Wa Hananaan Min Ladunna Wa Zakaatan Wa Kana Taqiyaan
Wa Barraan Biwalidayhi Wa Lam Yakun Jabbaraan `Asiyaan
Wa Salamun `Alayhi Yawma Wulida Wa Yawma Yamutu Wa Yawma Yub`athu Hayyaan
Wa Adhkur Fi Al-Kitabi Maryama 'Idh Antabadhat Min 'Ahliha Makanaan Sharqiyaan
Fattakhadhat Min Dunihim Hijabaan Fa'arsalna 'Ilayha Ruhana Fatamaththala Laha Basharaan Sawiyaan
Qalat 'Inni 'A`udhu Bir-Rahmani Minka 'In Kunta Taqiyaan
Qala 'Innama 'Ana Rasulu Rabbiki Li'haba Laki Ghulamaan Zakiyaan
Qalat 'Anna Yakunu Li Ghulamun Wa Lam Yamsasni Basharun Wa Lam 'Aku Baghiyaan
Qala Kadhaliki Qala Rabbuki Huwa `Alayya Hayyinun Wa Linaj`alahu 'Ayatan Lilnnasi Wa Rahmatan Minna Wa Kana 'Amraan Maqđiyaan
Fahamalat/hu Fantabadhat Bihi Makanaan Qasiyaan
Fa'aja'aha Al-Makhađu 'Ila Jidh`i An-Nakhlati Qalat Ya Laytani Mittu Qabla Hadha Wa Kuntu Nasyaan Mansiyaan
Fanadaha Min Tahtiha 'Alla Tahzani Qad Ja`ala Rabbuki Tahtaki Sariyaan
Wa Huzzi 'Ilayki Bijidh`i An-Nakhlati Tusaqit `Alayki Rutabaan Janiyaan
Fakuli Wa Ashrabi Wa Qarri `Aynaan Fa'imma Taraynna Mina Al-Bashari 'Ahadaan Faquli 'Inni Nadhartu Lilrrahmani Sawmaan Falan 'Ukallima Al-Yawma 'Insiyaan
Fa'atat Bihi Qawmaha Tahmiluhu Qalu Ya Maryamu Laqad Ji'ti Shay'aan Fariyaan
Ya 'Ukhta Haruna Ma Kana 'Abuki Amra'a Saw'in Wa Ma Kanat 'Ummuki Baghiyaan
Fa'asharat 'Ilayhi Qalu Kayfa Nukallimu Man Kana Fi Al-Mahdi Sabiyaan
Qala 'Inni `Abdu Allahi 'Ataniya Al-Kitaba Wa Ja`alani Nabiyaan
Wa Ja`alani Mubarakaan 'Ayna Ma Kuntu Wa 'Awsani Bis-Salaati Wa Az-Zakaati Ma Dumtu Hayyaan
Wa Barraan Biwalidati Wa Lam Yaj`alni Jabbaraan Shaqiyaan
Wa As-Salamu `Alayya Yawma Wulidtu Wa Yawma 'Amutu Wa Yawma 'Ub`athu Hayyaan
Dhalika `Isa Abnu Maryama Qawla Al-Haqqi Al-Ladhi Fihi Yamtaruna
Ma Kana Lillahi 'An Yattakhidha Min Waladin Subhanahu 'Idha Qađa 'Amraan Fa'innama Yaqulu Lahu Kun Fayakunu
Wa 'Inna Allaha Rabbi Wa Rabbukum Fa`buduhu Hadha Siratun Mustaqimun
Fakhtalafa Al-'Ahzabu Min Baynihim Fawaylun Lilladhina Kafaru Min Mash/hadi Yawmin `Azimin
Asmi` Bihim Wa 'Absir Yawma Ya'tunana Lakini Az-Zalimuna Al-Yawma Fi Đalalin Mubinin
Wa 'Andhirhum Yawma Al-Hasrati 'Idh Quđiya Al-'Amru Wa Hum Fi Ghaflatin Wa Hum La Yu'uminuna
Inna Nahnu Narithu Al-'Arđa Wa Man `Alayha Wa 'Ilayna Yurja`una
Wa Adhkur Fi Al-Kitabi 'Ibrahima 'Innahu Kana Siddiqaan Nabiyaan
Idh Qala Li'abihi Ya 'Abati Lima Ta`budu Ma La Yasma`u Wa La Yubsiru Wa La Yughni `Anka Shay'aan
Ya 'Abati 'Inni Qad Ja'ani Mina Al-`Ilmi Ma Lam Ya'tika Fa Attabi`ni 'Ahdika Sirataan Sawiyaan
Ya 'Abati La Ta`budi Ash-Shaytana 'Inna Ash-Shaytana Kana Lilrrahmani `Asiyaan
Ya 'Abati 'Inni 'Akhafu 'An Yamassaka `Adhabun Mina Ar-Rahmani Fatakuna Lilshaytani Waliyaan
Qala 'Araghibun 'Anta `An 'Alihati Ya 'Ibrahimu La'in Lam Tantahi La'arjumannaka Wa Ahjurni Maliyaan
Qala Salamun `Alayka Sa'astaghfiru Laka Rabbi 'Innahu Kana Bi Hafiyaan
Wa 'A`tazilukum Wa Ma Tad`una Min Duni Allahi Wa 'Ad`u Rabbi `Asa 'Alla 'Akuna Bidu`a'i Rabbi Shaqiyaan
Falamma A`tazalahum Wa Ma Ya`buduna Min Duni Allahi Wahabna Lahu 'Ishaqa Wa Ya`quba Wa Kulla Ja`alna Nabiyaan
Wa Wahabna Lahum Min Rahmatina Wa Ja`alna Lahum Lisana Sidqin `Aliyaan
Wa Adhkur Fi Al-Kitabi Musa 'Innahu Kana Mukhlasaan Wa Kana Rasulaan Nabiyaan
Wa Nadaynahu Min Janibi At-Turi Al-'Aymani Wa Qarrabnahu Najiyaan
Wa Wahabna Lahu Min Rahmatina 'Akhahu Haruna Nabiyaan
Wa Adhkur Fi Al-Kitabi 'Isma`ila 'Innahu Kana Sadiqa Al-Wa`di Wa Kana Rasulaan Nabiyaan
Wa Kana Ya'muru 'Ahlahu Bis-Salaati Wa Az-Zakaati Wa Kana `Inda Rabbihi Marđiyaan
Wa Adhkur Fi Al-Kitabi 'Idrisa 'Innahu Kana Siddiqaan Nabiyaan
Wa Rafa`nahu Makanaan `Aliyaan

Ula'ika Al-Ladhina 'An`ama Allahu `Alayhim Mina An-Nabiyina Min Dhurriyati 'Adama Wa Mimman Hamalna Ma`a Nuhin Wa Min Dhurriyati 'Ibrahima Wa 'Isra'ila Wa Mimman Hadayna Wa Ajtabayna 'Idha Tutla `Alayhim 'Ayatu Ar-Rahmani Kharru Sujjadaan Wa Bukiyaan
Fakhalafa Min Ba`dihim Khalfun 'Ađa`u As-Salaata Wa Attaba`u Ash-Shahawati Fasawfa Yalqawna Ghayyaan
Illa Man Taba Wa 'Amana Wa `Amila Salihaan Fa'ula'ika Yadkhuluna Al-Jannata Wa La Yuzlamuna Shay'aan
Jannati `Adnin Allati Wa`ada Ar-Rahmanu `Ibadahu Bil-Ghaybi 'Innahu Kana Wa`duhu Ma'tiyaan
La Yasma`una Fiha Laghwan 'Illa Salamaan Wa Lahum Rizquhum Fiha Bukratan Wa `Ashiyaan
Tilka Al-Jannatu Allati Nurithu Min `Ibadina Man Kana Taqiyaan
Wa Ma Natanazzalu 'Illa Bi'amri Rabbika Lahu Ma Bayna 'Aydina Wa Ma Khalfana Wa Ma Bayna Dhalika Wa Ma Kana Rabbuka Nasiyaan
Rabbu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Baynahuma Fa`bud/hu Wa Astabir Li`ibadatihi Hal Ta`lamu Lahu Samiyaan
Wa Yaqulu Al-'Insanu 'A'idha Ma Mittu Lasawfa 'Ukhraju Hayyaan
Awala Yadhkuru Al-'Insanu 'Anna Khalaqnahu Min Qablu Wa Lam Yaku Shay'aan
Fawarabbika Lanahshurannahum Wa Ash-Shayatina Thumma Lanuhđirannahum Hawla Jahannama Jithiyaan
Thumma Lananzi`anna Min Kulli Shi`atin 'Ayyuhum 'Ashaddu `Ala Ar-Rahmani `Itiyaan
Thumma Lanahnu 'A`lamu Bial-Ladhina Hum 'Awla Biha Siliyaan
Wa 'In Minkum 'Illa Wa Ariduha Kana `Ala Rabbika Hatmaan Maqđiyaan
Thumma Nunajji Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Wa Nadharu Az-Zalimina Fiha Jithiyaan
Wa 'Idha Tutla `Alayhim 'Ayatuna Bayyinatin Qala Al-Ladhina Kafaru Lilladhina 'Amanu 'Ayyu Al-Fariqayni Khayrun Maqamaan Wa 'Ahsanu Nadiyaan
Wa Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Min Qarnin Hum 'Ahsanu 'Athathaan Wa Ri'yaan
Qul Man Kana Fi Ađ-Đalalati Falyamdud Lahu Ar-Rahmanu Maddaan Hatta 'Idha Ra'aw Ma Yu`aduna 'Imma Al-`Adhaba Wa 'Imma As-Sa`ata Fasaya`lamuna Man Huwa Sharrun Makanaan Wa 'Ađ`afu Jundaan
Wa Yazidu Allahu Al-Ladhina Ahtadaw Hudaan Wa Al-Baqiyatu As-Salihatu Khayrun `Inda Rabbika Thawabaan Wa Khayrun Maraddaan
Afara'ayta Al-Ladhi Kafara Bi'ayatina Wa Qala La'utayanna Malaan Wa Waladaan
Attala`a Al-Ghayba 'Am Attakhadha `Inda Ar-Rahmani `Ahdaan
Kalla Sanaktubu Ma Yaqulu Wa Namuddu Lahu Mina Al-`Adhabi Maddaan
Wa Narithuhu Ma Yaqulu Wa Ya'tina Fardaan
Wa Attakhadhu Min Duni Allahi 'Alihatan Liyakunu Lahum `Izzaan
Kalla Sayakfuruna Bi`ibadatihim Wa Yakununa `Alayhim Điddaan
Alam Tara 'Anna 'Arsalna Ash-Shayatina `Ala Al-Kafirina Ta'uuzzuhum 'Azzaan
Fala Ta`jal `Alayhim 'Innama Na`uddu Lahum `Addaan
Yawma Nahshuru Al-Muttaqina 'Ila Ar-Rahmani Wafdaan
Wa Nasuqu Al-Mujrimina 'Ila Jahannama Wirdaan
La Yamlikuna Ash-Shafa`ata 'Illa Mani Attakhadha `Inda Ar-Rahmani `Ahdaan
Wa Qalu Attakhadha Ar-Rahmanu Waladaan
Laqad Ji'tum Shay'aan 'Iddaan
Takadu As-Samawatu Yatafattarna Minhu Wa Tanshaqqu Al-'Arđu Wa Takhirru Al-Jibalu Haddaan
An Da`aw Lilrrahmani Waladaan
Wa Ma Yanbaghi Lilrrahmani 'An Yattakhidha Waladaan
In Kullu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi 'Illa 'Ati Ar-Rahmani `Abdaan
Laqad 'Ahsahum Wa `Addahum `Addaan
Wa Kulluhum 'Atihi Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fardaan
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Sayaj`alu Lahumu Ar-Rahmanu Wuddaan
Fa'innama Yassarnahu Bilisanika Litubashira Bihi Al-Muttaqina Wa Tundhira Bihi Qawmaan Luddaan
Wa Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Min Qarnin Hal Tuhissu Minhum Min 'Ahadin 'Aw Tasma`u Lahum Rikzaan
Taha
Ma 'Anzalna `Alayka Al-Qur'ana Litashqa
Illa Tadhkiratan Liman Yakhsha
Tanzilaan Mimman Khalaqa Al-'Arđa Wa As-Samawati Al-`Ula
Ar-Rahmanu `Ala Al-`Arshi Astawa
Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Baynahuma Wa Ma Tahta Ath-Thara
Wa 'In Tajhar Bil-Qawli Fa'innahu Ya`lamu As-Sirra Wa 'Akhfa
Allahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Lahu Al-'Asma'u Al-Husna
Wa Hal 'Ataka Hadithu Musa
Idh Ra'a Naraan Faqala Li'hlihi Amkuthu 'Inni 'Anastu Naraan La`alli 'Atikum Minha Biqabasin 'Aw 'Ajidu `Ala An-Nari Hudaan
Falamma 'Ataha Nudi Ya Musa
Inni 'Ana Rabbuka Fakhla` Na`layka 'Innaka Bil-Wadi Al-Muqaddasi Tuaan
Wa 'Ana Akhtartuka Fastami` Lima Yuha
Innani 'Ana Allahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa 'Ana Fa`budni Wa 'Aqimi As-Salaata Lidhikri
Inna As-Sa`ata 'Atiyatun 'Akadu 'Ukhfiha Litujza Kullu Nafsin Bima Tas`a
Fala Yasuddannaka `Anha Man La Yu'uminu Biha Wa Attaba`a Hawahu Fatarda
Wa Ma Tilka Biyaminika Ya Musa
Qala Hiya `Asaya 'Atawakka'u `Alayha Wa 'Ahushu Biha `Ala Ghanami Wa Liya Fiha Ma'aribu 'Ukhra
Qala 'Alqiha Ya Musa
Fa'alqaha Fa'idha Hiya Hayyatun Tas`a
Qala Khudh/ha Wa La Takhaf Sanu`iduha Sirataha Al-'Ula
Wa Ađmum Yadaka 'Ila Janahika Takhruj Bayđa'a Min Ghayri Su'in 'Ayatan 'Ukhra
Linuriyaka Min 'Ayatina Al-Kubra
Adh/hab 'Ila Fir`awna 'Innahu Tagha
Qala Rabbi Ashrah Li Sadri
Wa Yassir Li 'Amri
Wa Ahlul `Uqdatan Min Lisani
Yafqahu Qawli
Wa Aj`al Li Waziraan Min 'Ahli
Haruna 'Akhi
Ashdud Bihi 'Azri
Wa 'Ashrik/hu Fi 'Amri
Kay Nusabbihaka Kathiraan
Wa Nadhkuraka Kathiraan
Innaka Kunta Bina Basiraan
Qala Qad 'Utita Su'ulaka Ya Musa
Wa Laqad Mananna `Alayka Marratan 'Ukhra
Idh 'Awhayna 'Ila 'Ummika Ma Yuha
Ani Aqdhifihi Fi At-Tabuti Faqdhifihi Fi Al-Yammi Falyulqihi Al-Yammu Bis-Sahili Ya'khudh/hu `Aduwun Li Wa`aduwun Lahu Wa 'Alqaytu `Alayka Mahabbatan Minni Wa Litusna`a `Ala `Ayni

Idh Tamshi 'Ukhtuka Fataqulu Hal 'Adullukum `Ala Man Yakfuluhu Faraja`naka 'Ila 'Ummika Kay Taqarra `Aynuha Wa La Tahzana Wa Qatalta Nafsaan Fanajjaynaka Mina Al-Ghammi Wa Fatannaka Futunaan Falabithta Sinina Fi 'Ahli Madyana Thumma Ji'ta `Ala Qadarin Ya Musa
Wa Astana`tuka Linafsi
Adh/hab 'Anta Wa 'Akhuka Bi'ayati Wa La Taniya Fi Dhikri
Adh/haba 'Ila Fir`awna 'Innahu Tagha
Faqula Lahu Qawlaan Layyinaan La`allahu Yatadhakkaru 'Aw Yakhsha
Qala Rabbana 'Innana Nakhafu 'An Yafruta `Alayna 'Aw 'An Yatgha
Qala La Takhafa 'Innani Ma`akuma 'Asma`u Wa 'Ara
Fa'tiyahu Faqula 'Inna Rasula Rabbika Fa'arsil Ma`ana Bani 'Isra'ila Wa La Tu`adhibhum Qad Ji'naka Bi'ayatin Min Rabbika Wa As-Salamu `Ala Mani Attaba`a Al-Huda
Inna Qad 'Uhiya 'Ilayna 'Anna Al-`Adhaba `Ala Man Kadhaba Wa Tawalla
Qala Faman Rabbukuma Ya Musa
Qala Rabbuna Al-Ladhi 'A`ta Kulla Shay'in Khalqahu Thumma Hada
Qala Fama Balu Al-Quruni Al-'Ula
Qala `Ilmuha `Inda Rabbi Fi Kitabin La Yađillu Rabbi Wa La Yansa
Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'Arđa Mahdaan Wa Salaka Lakum Fiha Subulaan Wa 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fa'akhrajna Bihi 'Azwajaan Min Nabatin Shatta
Kulu Wa Ar`aw 'An`amakum 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Li'wli An-Nuha
Minha Khalaqnakum Wa Fiha Nu`idukum Wa Minha Nukhrijukum Taratan 'Ukhra
Wa Laqad 'Araynahu 'Ayatina Kullaha Fakadhaba Wa 'Aba
Qala 'Aji'tana Litukhrijana Min 'Arđina Bisihrika Ya Musa
Falana'tiyannaka Bisihrin Mithlihi Faj`al Baynana Wa Baynaka Maw`idaan La Nukhlifuhu Nahnu Wa La 'Anta Makanaan Suaan
Qala Maw`idukum Yawmu Az-Zinati Wa 'An Yuhshara An-Nasu Đuhaan
Fatawalla Fir`awnu Fajama`a Kaydahu Thumma 'Ata
Qala Lahum Musa Waylakum La Taftaru `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan Fayushitakum Bi`adhabin Wa Qad Khaba Mani Aftara
Fatanaza`u 'Amrahum Baynahum Wa 'Asarru An-Najwa
Qalu 'In Hadhani Lasahirani Yuridani 'An Yukhrijakum Min 'Arđikum Bisihrihima Wa Yadh/haba Bitariqatikumu Al-Muthla
Fa'ajmi`u Kaydakum Thumma A'tu Saffaan Wa Qad 'Aflaha Al-Yawma Mani Asta`la
Qalu Ya Musa 'Imma 'An Tulqiya Wa 'Imma 'An Nakuna 'Awwala Man 'Alqa
Qala Bal 'Alqu Fa'idha Hibaluhum Wa `Isiyuhum Yukhayyalu 'Ilayhi Min Sihrihim 'Annaha Tas`a
Fa'awjasa Fi Nafsihi Khifatan Musa
Qulna La Takhaf 'Innaka 'Anta Al-'A`la
Wa 'Alqi Ma Fi Yaminika Talqaf Ma Sana`u 'Innama Sana`u Kaydu Sahirin Wa La Yuflihu As-Sahiru Haythu 'Ata
Fa'ulqiya As-Saharatu Sujjadaan Qalu 'Amanna Birabbi Haruna Wa Musa

Qala 'Amantum Lahu Qabla 'An 'Adhana Lakum 'Innahu Lakabirukumu Al-Ladhi `Allamakumu As-Sihra Fala'uqatti`anna 'Aydiyakum Wa 'Arjulakum Min Khilafin Wa La'usallibannakum Fi Judhu`i An-Nakhli Wa Lata`lamunna 'Ayyuna 'Ashaddu `Adhabaan Wa 'Abqa
Qalu Lan Nu'uthiraka `Ala Ma Ja'ana Mina Al-Bayyinati Wa Al-Ladhi Fatarana Faqđi Ma 'Anta Qađin 'Innama Taqđi Hadhihi Al-Hayaata Ad-Dunya
Inna 'Amanna Birabbina Liyaghfira Lana Khatayana Wa Ma 'Akrahtana `Alayhi Mina As-Sihri Wa Allahu Khayrun Wa 'Abqa
Innahu Man Ya'ti Rabbahu Mujrimaan Fa'inna Lahu Jahannama La Yamutu Fiha Wa La Yahya
Wa Man Ya'tihi Mu'uminaan Qad `Amila As-Salihati Fa'ula'ika Lahumu Ad-Darajatu Al-`Ula
Jannatu `Adnin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha Wa Dhalika Jaza'u Man Tazakka
Wa Laqad 'Awhayna 'Ila Musa 'An 'Asri Bi`ibadi Fađrib Lahum Tariqaan Fi Al-Bahri Yabasaan La Takhafu Darakaan Wa La Takhsha
Fa'atba`ahum Fir`awnu Bijunudihi Faghashiyahum Mina Al-Yammi Ma Ghashiyahum
Wa 'Ađalla Fir`awnu Qawmahu Wa Ma Hada
Ya Bani 'Isra'ila Qad 'Anjaynakum Min `Aduwikum Wa Wa`adnakum Janiba At-Turi Al-'Aymana Wa Nazzalna `Alaykumu Al-Manna Wa As-Salwa
Kulu Min Tayyibati Ma Razaqnakum Wa La Tatghaw Fihi Fayahilla `Alaykum Ghađabi Wa Man Yahlil `Alayhi Ghađabi Faqad Hawa
Wa 'Inni Laghaffarun Liman Taba Wa 'Amana Wa `Amila Salihaan Thumma Ahtada
Wa Ma 'A`jalaka `An Qawmika Ya Musa
Qala Hum 'Ula'i `Ala 'Athari Wa `Ajiltu 'Ilayka Rabbi Litarđa
Qala Fa'inna Qad Fatanna Qawmaka Min Ba`dika Wa 'Ađallahumu As-Samiriyu

Faraja`a Musa 'Ila Qawmihi Ghađbana 'Asifaan Qala Ya Qawmi 'Alam Ya`idkum Rabbukum Wa`daan Hasanaan 'Afatala `Alaykumu Al-`Ahdu 'Am 'Aradtum 'An Yahilla `Alaykum Ghađabun Min Rabbikum Fa'akhlaftum Maw`idi
Qalu Ma 'Akhlafna Maw`idaka Bimalkina Wa Lakinna Hummilna 'Awzaraan Min Zinati Al-Qawmi Faqadhafnaha Fakadhalika 'Alqa As-Samiriyu
Fa'akhraja Lahum `Ijlaan Jasadaan Lahu Khuwarun Faqalu Hadha 'Ilahukum Wa 'Ilahu Musa Fanasiya
Afala Yarawna 'Alla Yarji`u 'Ilayhim Qawlaan Wa La Yamliku Lahum Đarraan Wa La Naf`aan
Wa Laqad Qala Lahum Harunu Min Qablu Ya Qawmi 'Innama Futintum Bihi Wa 'Inna Rabbakumu Ar-Rahmanu Fa Attabi`uni Wa 'Ati`u 'Amri
Qalu Lan Nabraha `Alayhi `Akifina Hatta Yarji`a 'Ilayna Musa
Qala Ya Harunu Ma Mana`aka 'Idh Ra'aytahum Đallu
Alla Tattabi`ani 'Afa`asayta 'Amri
Qala Yabna'uumma La Ta'khudh Bilihyati Wa La Bira'si 'Inni Khashitu 'An Taqula Farraqta Bayna Bani 'Isra'ila Wa Lam Tarqub Qawli
Qala Fama Khatbuka Ya Samiriyu
Qala Basurtu Bima Lam Yabsuru Bihi Faqabađtu Qabđatan Min 'Athari Ar-Rasuli Fanabadhtuha Wa Kadhalika Sawwalat Li Nafsi

Qala Fadh/hab Fa'inna Laka Fi Al-Hayaati 'An Taqula La Misasa Wa 'Inna Laka Maw`idaan Lan Tukhlafahu Wa Anzur 'Ila 'Ilahika Al-Ladhi Zalta `Alayhi `Akifaan Lanuharriqannahu Thumma Lanansifannahu Fi Al-Yammi Nasfaan
Innama 'Ilahukumu Allahu Al-Ladhi La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Wasi`a Kulla Shay'in `Ilmaan
Kadhalika Naqussu `Alayka Min 'Anba'i Ma Qad Sabaqa Wa Qad 'Ataynaka Min Ladunna Dhikraan
Man 'A`rađa `Anhu Fa'innahu Yahmilu Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wizraan
Khalidina Fihi Wa Sa'a Lahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Himlaan
Yawma Yunfakhu Fi As-Suri Wa Nahshuru Al-Mujrimina Yawma'idhin Zurqaan
Yatakhafatuna Baynahum 'In Labithtum 'Illa `Ashraan
Nahnu 'A`lamu Bima Yaquluna 'Idh Yaqulu 'Amthaluhum Tariqatan 'In Labithtum 'Illa Yawmaan
Wa Yas'alunaka `Ani Al-Jibali Faqul Yansifuha Rabbi Nasfaan
Fayadharuha Qa`aan Safsafaan
La Tara Fiha `Iwajaan Wa La 'Amtaan
Yawma'idhin Yattabi`una Ad-Da`i La `Iwaja Lahu Wa Khasha`ati Al-'Aswatu Lilrrahmani Fala Tasma`u 'Illa Hamsaan
Yawma'idhin La Tanfa`u Ash-Shafa`atu 'Illa Man 'Adhina Lahu Ar-Rahmanu Wa Rađiya Lahu Qawlaan
Ya`lamu Ma Bayna 'Aydihim Wa Ma Khalfahum Wa La Yuhituna Bihi `Ilmaan
Wa `Anati Al-Wujuhu Lilhayyi Al-Qayyumi Wa Qad Khaba Man Hamala Zulmaan
Wa Man Ya`mal Mina As-Salihati Wa Huwa Mu'uminun Fala Yakhafu Zulmaan Wa La Hađmaan
Wa Kadhalika 'Anzalnahu Qur'anaan `Arabiyaan Wa Sarrafna Fihi Mina Al-Wa`idi La`allahum Yattaquna 'Aw Yuhdithu Lahum Dhikraan
Fata`ala Allahu Al-Maliku Al-Haqqu Wa La Ta`jal Bil-Qur'ani Min Qabli 'An Yuqđa 'Ilayka Wahyuhu Wa Qul Rabbi Zidni `Ilmaan
Wa Laqad `Ahidna 'Ila 'Adama Min Qablu Fanasiya Wa Lam Najid Lahu `Azmaan
Wa 'Idh Qulna Lilmala'ikati Asjudu Li'dama Fasajadu 'Illa 'Iblisa 'Aba
Faqulna Ya 'Adamu 'Inna Hadha `Aduwun Laka Wa Lizawjika Fala Yukhrijannakuma Mina Al-Jannati Fatashqa
Inna Laka 'Alla Taju`a Fiha Wa La Ta`ra
Wa 'Annaka La Tazma'u Fiha Wa La Tađha
Fawaswasa 'Ilayhi Ash-Shaytanu Qala Ya 'Adamu Hal 'Adulluka `Ala Shajarati Al-Khuldi Wa Mulkin La Yabla
Fa'akala Minha Fabadat Lahuma Saw'atuhuma Wa Tafiqa Yakhsifani `Alayhima Min Waraqi Al-Jannati Wa `Asa 'Adamu Rabbahu Faghawa
Thumma Ajtabahu Rabbuhu Fataba `Alayhi Wa Hada
Qala Ahbita Minha Jami`aan Ba`đukum Liba`đin `Aduwun Fa'imma Ya'tiyannakum Minni Hudaan Famani Attaba`a Hudaya Fala Yađillu Wa La Yashqa
Wa Man 'A`rađa `An Dhikri Fa'inna Lahu Ma`ishatan Đankaan Wa Nahshuruhu Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'A`ma
Qala Rabbi Lima Hashartani 'A`ma Wa Qad Kuntu Basiraan
Qala Kadhalika 'Atatka 'Ayatuna Fanasitaha Wa Kadhalika Al-Yawma Tunsa
Wa Kadhalika Najzi Man 'Asrafa Wa Lam Yu'umin Bi'ayati Rabbihi Wa La`adhabu Al-'Akhirati 'Ashaddu Wa 'Abqa
Afalam Yahdi Lahum Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Mina Al-Quruni Yamshuna Fi Masakinihim 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Li'wli An-Nuha
Wa Lawla Kalimatun Sabaqat Min Rabbika Lakana Lizamaan Wa 'Ajalun Musammaan
Fasbir `Ala Ma Yaquluna Wa Sabbih Bihamdi Rabbika Qabla Tulu`i Ash-Shamsi Wa Qabla Ghurubiha Wa Min 'Ana'i Al-Layli Fasabbih Wa 'Atrafa An-Nahari La`allaka Tarđa
Wa La Tamuddanna `Aynayka 'Ila Ma Matta`na Bihi 'Azwajaan Minhum Zahrata Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Linaftinahum Fihi Wa Rizqu Rabbika Khayrun Wa 'Abqa
Wa 'Mur 'Ahlaka Bis-Salaati Wa Astabir `Alayha La Nas'aluka Rizqaan Nahnu Narzuquka Wa Al-`Aqibatu Lilttaqwa
Wa Qalu Lawla Ya'tina Bi'ayatin Min Rabbihi 'Awalam Ta'tihim Bayyinatu Ma Fi As-Suhufi Al-'Ula
Wa Law 'Anna 'Ahlaknahum Bi`adhabin Min Qablihi Laqalu Rabbana Lawla 'Arsalta 'Ilayna Rasulaan Fanattabi`a 'Ayatika Min Qabli 'An Nadhilla Wa Nakhza
Qul Kullun Mutarabbisun Fatarabbasu Fasata`lamuna Man 'Ashabu As-Sirati As-Sawiyi Wa Mani Ahtada
